Enable this to give chat messages an outline, to reduce blending with background video.
Enable this to give chat messages a shadow, to reduce blending with background video.
When enabled, clicking on the 'OK' button on your keyboard will send the message. When this is disabled, it will simply close the keyboard without doing anything.
Default is 40 (Almost transparent), change this if you want to make the room details' panel more readable by increasing opacity.
Default is 0 (transparent). Maximum is 255 (100% Opaque). Increase readability of the messages by making background more opaque.
Changes message text size. Default is 10.
Default is 10. Limits the message number count to this value.

Customize the text color of message timestamps (Default is Pink)
Customize the text color of your name tag (Default is Dark Red)
Customize the text color of friends' name tags (Default is Blue)
Customize the text color of system room messages (Default is White)
Customize the text color of user messages (Default is White)

This changes subtitle size for sideloaded subtitles (when you load them from a file). Default is 16. Subtitle size for built-in subtitles cannot be changed.
Default is 0. This will delay or advance the subtitle track. Use negative values to advance it.
Default is 0. This will delay or advance the audio track. Use negative values to advance it.
Specifies how many seconds a seek-forward should skip. Default is 10 seconds.
Specifies how many seconds a seek-backward should rewind. Default is 10 seconds.
Whether the player should enter windowed picture-in-picture mode when minimizing the app. Default is true
How many seconds to wait for reconnection on each failure of connection or disconneciton. Default is 2 seconds.
Reset all of the above settings to default.
Disable this to use software acceleration instead.
Force mpv to use brand-new video rendering backend, based on libplacebo.
Show statistics and information about the current backend.

Reduce jittering by enabling framerate interpolation. Note that this will only be applied if the video sync option is set to one of the 'display' mode, otherwise it will be silently ignored. This may not work well in some cases.

Controls how mpv syncs the video, either to audio (default, recommended) or the display itself. Setting this to anything but 'audio' may cause issues on displays with high frame refresh rates (>60 FPS). Consider lowering your device's framerate accordingly.
Configures mpv capabilities according to one of the built-in profile presets. Default is 'fast' as it is phone-friendly. Using 'low-latency' can be good when streaming from live sources.
Show Custom Skip Button on Main Screen
Enabling this will display the custom 'Skip period' button, found in the 'Seek to Position' popup, on the main player screen between the rewind and fast-forward buttons for easier access.
The default skip duration is 90 seconds (1:30 minutes), which is ideal for anime. You can adjust this duration for the custom skip button here.
